Thanks Barts,

I know about the information about each jop separatly, but I want to 
work with all this files at the same time.
I want to make full reports and statics including the information of all 
crawled jobs as one.

I need data like:

Total Jobs Crawled: 25
Total Seeds Crawled: 150
Total Seeds Crawled from Job1: 150
Total Seeds Crawled from Job2: 150
....
Total Hosts Crawled: 18
Total Hosts Crawled from Job1: 18
Total Hosts Crawled from Job12: 18
...
Total Documents Crawled: 889
Total Documents Crawled from Job1: 8
Total Documents Crawled from Job2: 58
....

Total Raw Data Size in Bytes: 34829016 (33 MB)
Total Raw Data Size in Bytes from Job1: 3 (xx MB)
Total Raw Data Size in Bytes from Job2: 16 (xx MB)
.....

and show some graphs

Natalia
